name: Kaede the Eliminator / Eliminator 小枫
name_original: Kaede the Eliminator / Eliminator 小枫
description:
The self-proclaimed most indecent TPS (third-person shooting) game in Japan.
The silver-haired girl simply blasts away at unfamiliar creatures with her gun!

Shoot down enemies over and over in the Survival Mode.
Target enemies within a specific time frame in the sniper mode.
Includes 3 mini-games where you complete 10 stages within a time limit.
The Survival Mode has items such as a turret to put you at an advantage!

Functions that allow you to change outfits and enjoy "special actions" is also included.
